text: if we wouldn't have gone to AWS
trainings I think our progress would
have been much slower there would have
been a lot of pitfalls I can say that
AWS trainings helped us tremendously to

now my name is Christian burm I'm the
head of data center infrastructure at
seens in Germany seens is a big company
there in almost every business industry
healthc care mobility and uh now we
started a cloud initiative when we
started we had about 80 people that were
brought to our project and no one of
them really had a clue about Cloud
without the trainings we wouldn't have
had everyone talk with the same language
and this was really really helpful if
upper management talks to anyone of the
team they get the same answer it's a
consistent answer and that's very
important to build the trust we had to
get them started and that's why we have
chosen the AWS Essentials trainings to
bring everyone on the same level of
knowledge so when we're talking about
Cloud everyone has a basic understanding
what is meant and then later on we just
brought some Specialists into more uh
detailed Parts like architecture or
security or software development
whatever fits the certain role of that
person out of these 80 plus people we
had we built a core team of eight people
who were really going deeply into AWS
who learned all the certain things that
you need to know when they started
developing Solutions uh it's like a
positive virus everyone wanted to be
part of it and also want to do the cool
things they are doing we had the
instructors onite and this helped a lot
because we didn't need to have a certain
amount of people travel to a training
location so it was more convenient for
them my advice is when you start on
AWS go for Essentials training for
everyone so everyone understands the
basic principles pick a few people build
a core team train them well up and then
the other ones will follow because they
see what happens and they just want to
be part of the show
